channel.title: Wisp problems that came out recently
channel.description:
**What happened?** Both mm and cw visited the princesss, the barrier protected the princess, She wisped me and it only said the cw visited her.
In another game, me(physician) a knight and an assasin visited the princess, and the wisp only showed me and the assasin, so she was sure that i was the knight the whole game.
**Whats was supposed to happen** Princess wisp should show almost everyone but inquisitor

item.title: Wisp problems that came out recently
item.dc:creator: Laiskis
item.description:
I’ve had several issues with MM and CL convert visits not shown on either Will-o-wisp or Observer follow. Is that actually a feature to avoid CL or MM being busted?

In the past I remember those been seen on either wisp or follow.

Read full topic

item.description:
What happened?
Both mm and cw visited the princesss, the barrier protected the princess,
She wisped me and it only said the cw visited her.

In another game, me(physician) a knight and an assasin visited the princess, and the wisp only showed me and the assasin, so she was sure that i was the knight the whole game.

Whats was supposed to happen
Princess wisp should show almost everyone but inquisitor
